page.title: 03A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I WOKE UP AT 7:30 am READ A BOOK THEN HAD A CUP OF TEA.I WENT DOWN STAIRS TO HAVE MY BREAK- FAST WHICH CONSISTED OF CEREAL, FRUIT JUICE AND TOAST.AFTER THAT I WENT UP STAIRS TO WASH,BRUSH MY TEETH AND PUT ON MY SCHOOL UNIFORM BEFORE LEAVING FOR SCHOOL,A TWO MINUTE WALK. SCHOOL STARTS AT 9:00am WITH AN ASSEMBLY OF THE WHOLE SCHOOL IN THE HALL.THE FIRST LESSON TODAY WAS MATHS IN WHICH WE HAD A TABLES TEST,AFTER PLAY WE THEN HAD ENGLISH,DURING WHICH LESSON I USED THE COMPUTER.FOR LUNCH, WHICH I HAD AT SCHOOL,IHAD COTTAGE PIE FOLLOWED BY FRUIT PIE.SCHOOL IN THE AFTERNOON BEGINS AT 1;10pm.WE HAD FRENCH FOLLOWED BY GAMES .AFTER A 15 MINUTE BREAK WE THEN HAD ART,SCHOOL ENDED AT 3:45pm.HAVING GOT HOME I WATCHED TELEVISION THEN HAD TEA, I WENT TO BED AT 9:30pm.
